title: LOW MS, HIGH FPS and still lagging/teleporting in-game.
body:
So this issue started today and I have no idea why. I get a solid 25 ms ingame and 60fps locked and yet I still stutter in game and whilst i see the other players moving around I don't see them actually attacking each other until my champ catches up in real time and all I see is everyone moving in fast forward action. Its like my champ is stuck in time lol and by the time I get control of my champ I'm either dead or somewhere way behind where the fight took place.. 

I've checked packet loss and I have zero. I've also checked speeds and uploads and everythings running the same and Ive reset router and reinstalled league lol.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Definitely does sound like there's some sort of connection issue going on here.

Could you do the following for me;

* [Switch to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5)
* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text.
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/).
* Post back with a link to your WinMTR results (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this) and the direct url to your ICSI netalyzr results.
